Text: thank you, I tried downloading a different Purple Haze from someone else and it was a bunch of nonsense songs, at least you got the tracks right on this torrent. Cam'ron is the shit, Purple Haze is mint, Killa Season is mint, Crime Pays is meh.

god damnit this is the same torrent I downloaded before with the random songs in it. The description says all the right songs but then you get a bunch of shit songs that aren't on the album in the torrent.

THIS IS NOT PURPLE HAZE, only a few songs from the album and other random Cam songs.
